content: Link successfully created and copied to clipboard

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a success message when a link is successfully created and copied to the clipboard, typically in response to button clicks or dialog actions. The message informs users that their link has been successfully generated and made available for sharing. It appears in the UI when creating or editing links, such as in edit link panels or info panel dialogs.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'mübadilə buferə' is an awkward translation of 'clipboard'. While technically correct, a more natural and idiomatic Azerbaijani term would be more appropriate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'keçid lövhəsinə' or 'yayımlama lövhəsinə' instead of 'mübadilə buferə'. For example, 'Link uğurla yaradıldı və keçid lövhəsinə kopyalandı'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'correctly' is redundant. 'Se ha creado y copiado' implies successful creation and copying.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: El enlace se ha creado y copiado en el portapapeles

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "සබැඳිය පසුරුපුවරුවට පිටපත් විය" doesn't fully capture the meaning of 'Link successfully created and copied to clipboard'. It translates to 'Link copied to clipboard'. It misses the 'created' aspect of the original English sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more comprehensive translation that includes the creation of the link, such as "සබැඳිය සාදා පසුරුපුවරුවට පිටපත් විය" (Link created and copied to clipboard).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While the words used are generally correct, there's a slight potential for improvement in phrasing. The use of "පිටපත් විය" (copied) is acceptable, but more natural phrasing might exist depending on the context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Further review by a native Sinhala speaker is recommended to ensure the most natural and idiomatic phrasing is used. Alternative phrasing may improve clarity.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'created' is translated as 'креиран', which while understandable, isn't the most natural or common translation for 'created' in this context. 'Направљен' would be more accurate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Линк успешно направљен и копиран у привремену меморију

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the Serbian translation might benefit from capitalizing the first letter of the sentence for consistency with formal communication.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Линк успешно направљен и копиран у привремену меморију

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'privremena memorija' (temporary memory) is a literal translation of 'clipboard'. In Serbian, 'clipbord' is often used directly or a more natural phrase like 'na isečnu tablu' would be preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Link uspešno kreiran i kopiran na isečnu tablu

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Đã tạo và sao chép liên kết thành công vào bộ nhớ tạm' doesn't perfectly capture the meaning of 'Link successfully created and copied to clipboard'.  'Bộ nhớ tạm' literally means 'temporary memory', which is a more technical term for clipboard. A more natural translation for 'clipboard' would be 'khay nhớ tạm' or simply 'khay'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Đã tạo và sao chép liên kết thành công vào khay nhớ tạm

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, using 'khay' instead of 'khay nhớ tạm' could be more concise and natural in this context. The current translation is a bit verbose.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Đã tạo và sao chép liên kết thành công vào khay
